text: Pepin I of Aquitaine, (or Pepin V of Aquitaine, ca. 797 - 838) was the Carolingian dynasty king of Aquitaine from 814 to 838. He was the second son of emperor Louis the Pious. ==Related pages== * King of Aquitaine * Pepin II of Aquitaine * Louis the Pious * Louis the German * Lothair I * Charles the Bald == Other websites == *Familypedia Category:Holy Roman Emperors Category:Kings of France Category:790s births Category:838 deaths
title: Pepin I of Aquitaine
